Name: Ginger Last Word
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Green Chartreuse (or alternative herbal liqueur)
Instructions: MUDDLE ginger with gin in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Review: As the name suggests this is simply a Last Word with a hint of ginger. Simple can be beautiful.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2016 by Riccardo Aletta (AKA 'Ricky D Wing') at Holy Birds, London, England. Ricky calls this drink a "Vegan Last Word," but we thought 'Ginger' better said what was in the tin. Last Word history
